metadata.title: Sttok for Lawyers
metadata.description: Corporate management software for Lawyers. Sttok allows you to manage the shareholder register, incentive plans, shareholder meetings, board of directors, etc.
metadata.keywords: corporate management, lawyers, captable, shareholder register, incentive plans, shareholder meetings, boards, testimonials

hero.title: Solution for Lawyers
hero.description: With Sttok, you digitize corporate management, increasing the number of companies a lawyer can manage, saving time and avoiding errors. Sttok allows you to provide better service to clients by saving time and adding value.

features.title: Key Features for Lawyers
features.description: Sttok allows lawyers to digitize corporate management, optimizing tasks such as shareholder registers, shareholder meetings, Boards, or incentive plans.

items.title: Shareholder Register
items.description: Efficiently manage the shareholder register digitally and without errors.

items.title: Operations Simulator
items.description: Perform exact calculations for corporate operations in minutes.

items.title: Incentive Plans
items.description: Automate the management of stock options and other incentive plans.

items.title: Shareholder Meetings
items.description: Convene, vote, and manage shareholder meetings digitally.

items.title: Board of Directors
items.description: Digitally manage Board meetings and voting.

items.title: Corporate Documentation
items.description: Generate and manage minutes, certificates, and other documents automatically.

testimonials.title: What Our Clients Say
testimonials.description: Companies that have already improved their corporate management with Sttok.

items.name: Patricia Manca
items.description: Sttok helps us in the digital management of companies, facilitating the automation of critical processes such as meetings, captables, and incentive plans.

items.name: Jose María Baños
items.description: Sttok has automated a large part of corporate management, allowing us to offer better service to our clients.
